title: organizer.labels
description:
One or more labels that categorize the [organizer](./organizer.json). Labels do not have a defined set of possible values or a hierarchy.

Labels are allowed to be visible for end users on publication channels.

Labels must match the `^(?=.{2,255}$)(?=.*\S.*\S.*)[^;]*$` pattern.

See [hiddenLabels](./organizer-hiddenLabels.json) for labels that should not be visible on publication channels.
